name: Wheel of Fortune (itch) (R.Helm, Arykolos, KodokunaKenshi, Ninsn, papermond)
name_original: Wheel of Fortune (itch) (R.Helm, Arykolos, KodokunaKenshi, Ninsn, papermond)
description:
It´s time to d-d-duel! Draw 3 cards and the combat is ready to begin. Brawl against a friend in an EPIC  1v1 pvp 2D brawl. The rules are simple: the first to win 2 battles wins the fight. The wheel of fortune decides the match up abilites and location of the battle, but you choose your fate. Now let´s get ready and fight!

Platform:

Windows

Controls:

1P [WASD] and [GHJ] vs 2P [Left Joystick] [XYBA]

Made for the HTK-GameJam 2021 Theme: Tarot Created in less than 105 hours

Credits:

Team#2
